snippet.title: The Hand of Merlin -- Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist and follow The Hand of Merlin today 🧙‍♂️: https://bit.ly/HandOfMerlin

The Hand of Merlin is a turn-based rogue-lite RPG in which Arthurian legend clashes with sci-fi horror. Recruit a company of up to four mortal heroes and guide them in spirit on a desperate journey from Albion to Jerusalem. Explore a richly-imagined medieval setting on the brink of apocalypse. Trade with merchants, improve your heroes and unearth ancient relics. Search for the lost fragments of your soul, scattered across the multiverse - and save as many worlds as you can.

Look for Merlin in these places of magic: 
🏰 https://discord.gg/ej8sjxx
⚔️ https://www.facebook.com/TheHandOfMerlin/

Follow Croteam on Twitter and Instagram, like us on Facebook and don’t forget to join our ever-growing Croteam family on Discord and Reddit:
💬 http://bit.ly/croteamondiscord
🤩 http://reddit.com/r/croteam
🐦 http://twitter.com/croteam
👍 http://facebook.com/croteam
📸 http://instagram.com/officialcroteam
